Class playn.core.Mouse.ButtonEvent

Removed interface playn.core.Events.Position.

Changed from an interface to a class. Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Added Constructors
Mouse.ButtonEvent(int, double, float, float, Id, boolean)  
 

Removed Methods
int button() The id of the button associated with this event, one of .BUTTON_LEFT, .BUTTON_MIDDLE, or .BUTTON_RIGHT.
 

Added Fields
Id button The id of the button associated with this event.
boolean down True if the button was just pressed, false if it was just released.
